official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal program of impact aid with respect to the children of military personnel should be transferred to the Secretary of Defense.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House that Congress should transfer to the Secretary of Defense the responsibility for compensating local school districts for the education of the children of military personnel.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal program of impact aid with respect to the children of military personnel should be transferred to the Secretary of Defense.
